body_html:
@poxvoculi I experience it constantly. This is a single worker run using 2 GPUs. I also sometimes got an assertion failure at https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/common_runtime/collective_rma_local.cc#L49
CHECK_EQ(recv_bytes, hook->prod_value->TotalBytes());.
Let me know if i can provide more debugging info.
